TopicTitle: Does anyone have a heavy eve launcher?

Articles.Content: Hey guys, i was wondering if anybody has a relatively low part eve launcher that can carry 8 tons to orbit. It cant have aerospikes cause im using career mode. Thanks

If you want to launch 8 tonnes from Eve to orbit, you'll need something of this size:

Getting it to Eve fully fueled will either require a ridiculously big launcher or tens of hours of refueling operations. There's a thread telling how I did it.

With stock parts this is the 'normal' size. Another legal way to decrease the size is the altitude of landing site. See the wiki!

Among the semi-realistic mods the hooligan labs airships can help you to decrease the size radically.
